post.body: Right there with ya, sistah! It's the same reasoning for me, too. Portlanders dunno how to drive in it. Adjust my driving? Why?:)
Those are great cars, too. That's right, I forget you come from snow country originally, too. Yay for snow country!
Doubt it, but snow tires will only work so much on ice. Just have to adjust speed, start breaking sooner & pump breaks 2 slow dn.
light snow was falling in Parkrose @ 8 am this morning. Must have finally moved your way. Wonder what it's doing @ my house now.
Yay! Glad you're feeling better! Isn't Noel the BEST?
Um, yeah, I know. Had multiple emails collide on the same day that need to go out either today or tomorrow. Tired of coding.
No, you're not the only one. It happens to me a lot, too. I've been drinking ginger water to keep bugs away b4 i leave Tues.
Yeah, I know, but I'm still hoping for a closing. I just know my street is going to be slick, slick, slick!
where in the world did you do that? You must tell!
No recycling centers here. Supposedly, there are ppl that "grab the big stuff" when it's taken to the landfill. No rm 2 take home.
Never said it wasn't quaint. Just saying it was nuts that they didn't accept MC or VISA. That's all. :-)
U & Trav are gonna have to come over for homemade pizza one night. YUM!
Not at all! I feel the same way! Bring on the holiday lunch!
Amen, brotha! And @smartwick, I agree - hush you!
You're a machine! Where's your off switch? ;-)
Thx to @coldinpdx for sharing vid link: http://budurl.com/pdxice @PortlandSnow - I see your evil plan is working perfectly! LOL @ PDXers.
Screw it. I just heated up my fried rice. Best...brunch...ever.
Is it wrong that I want to eat my delish, homemade fried rice that E made for breakfast?
Ready to head home after such a busy day at work. Who knew you could fall so behind after only one office closure day due to bad weather?
I'm exhausted. Coding three emails in one day is plenty tiring w/no break. Now to start loading them into the ESP...
Where has the day gone? All I've done is work on and send emails today! Geez...
MMMM....Costco cheese ravioli w/homemade red sauce w/ground turkey. Lunch is a good time of day.
Feeling out of sorts today since we were closed due to the bad weather. Where's my head? I still can't find it!
#omgbrr Finding that I still have some drafts in this house. And just when I thought I had plugged all of them already. Grrr
Getting ready to eat yummy dinner of ginger chicken & rice. Hoping office will be closed 2morrow so I can wk from home. I think will b slick
Ok, heading out for the night...right after I play with a couple of photos to load into Flickr. And then will load more tonight. Yay!
Spent the day @ Dave & Busters. Don't know it? Like Chuck E. Cheese for grown ups. Killed zombies, shot aliens & drove an 18-wheeler. :-)
http://twitpic.com/wx6j - It's wild driving down the highway and suddenly seeing a camel grazing off to the side. Had to stop and take a ...
TX == polar opposite of OR. No recycling. I'm dying having to throw everything into the garbage. AAAAARRRRGGGG!!!!!!
Let me clarify - Fredericksburg restaurant took AMEX and Discover - NOT MC and VISA. This is my main issue. Very backwards. Welcome 2 TX.
Had lunch @ a restaurant in Fredericksburg, TX that did NOT accept MC or VISA. WTF? Sis had to go get $$ to pay for lunch. Unbelievable!
Is reminiscing about Christmases gone by in the blog: http://is.gd/dvm0 Take a peek if you like
Merry Christmas, everyone, from 66 degree San Antonio, TX! Hope you're all staying warm wherever you are. :-)
Made it outta PDX w/no prob yesterday. Shopping 2day homemade pizza dough rising now. Yay for Xmas Eve pizza! Always better when u make it.
OK, time to go pack. Taking only carry ons w/all the trouble going on @PDX. don't wanna take much if we have to turn around and come home.
omg thank god for neighbor. She's taking us to PDX in the am to catch flight. Here's hoping we can get out! Off to shovel front porch again.
Thx 2 neighbor's truck, got Fiona to bird sitter this pm. No way I was getting out at all. Hoping I can get out of PDX 2morrow am 2 TX.
It's snowing in downtown PDX...I can only imagine what it's doing on the E side by my place. Thanks, @PortlandSnow...May I go home now?
Regretting my decision to trust the weather this am and not wear my boots. Everything was dry and clear, then hail as soon as I got to MAX.
